content: This is pretty awesome, if you don’t mind me asking, how long have you been programming, this question might be stupid or irrelevant all together, but the reason I’m asking is that, there is an African game (from Botswana to be specific) that I really like, which is similer to cheers and there are not many people that know how to play it where I live, (Utah). Did I mention that it’s a game I really like?. Anyway, I’m very impressed and inspired by your post and I thought, man… I could perhaps make or rather build and play it, I’m not a gammer but this paticular game is one I can play hours on end with no problem. Unfortunately I’m very new to programming, and every concerpt you mentioned above is somewhat gebrish. :( What would you recommend I learn so I could be ready to hangle something like that? I just know HTML & CSS.
